data.title: Joyalukkas Group wins Retail Jeweller World Middle East award
data.meta_description: Jewellery brand Joyalukkas Group has won an award at the Retail Jeweller World Middle East Awards.
data.text:
Jewellery brand Joyalukkas Group has won an award at the Retail Jeweller World Middle East Awards.

Based in the UAE and India, the retailer won the ‘Indian Bridal Wedding Jewellery of the Year’ award.

Mr John Paul Alukkas, managing director of Joyalukkas Group – international operations, received the fourth edition of the Retail Jeweller World Middle East Awards.

“We have an exquisite and exclusive collection of gold and diamond jewellery, specially dedicated to the wedding segment. We understand the sanctity associated with weddings and our wedding collections are designed keeping this in mind. We feel honoured that we have been recognized for our efforts in this segment and we will be consciously striving to enhance the wedding jewellery shopping experience,” said Mr Alukkas.

The Retail Jeweller Middle East Awards platform recognises achievements across design, marketing, customer experience and more from the region’s premier jewellery business houses.

A statement added that a dedicated team at the Retail Jeweller was involved in the process to identify the 2023 edition award winners.

The Joyalukkas Group was founded by Indian businessman Joy Alukkas in 2001, who is currently serving as the chairman and managing director of the company.

Other businesses headed by Joy Alukkas include Mall of Joy, a shopping retail destination, Jolly Silks, a silk fashion label, Joyalukkas Exchange, a money exchange platform, and Joyalukkas Lifestyle Developers, a real estate company.
